Directed by Shari Springer Berman. Robert Pulcini. Jonathan Dayton. Valerie Faris. Alice Wu.

Written by Taffy Brodesser-Akner. Taffy Brodesser-Akner. Taffy Brodesser-Akner. Michael Goldbach.

Cast Claire Danes( Rachel Fleishman). Lizzy Caplan( Libby Epstein). Adam Brody( Seth Morris). Meara Mahoney Gross( Hannah Fleishman). Maxim Swinton( Solly Fleishman). Josh Stamberg( Sam Rothberg). Jenny Powers( Miriam Rothberg). Joy Suprano( Cyndi Leffer). Ralph Adriel Johnson( Phillip). Ava Yaghmaie( Joanie Heydari) . Ashley Austin Morris( Roxanne Hertz). Brian Miskell( Clay Clifton) . Josh Radnor( Adam Epstein). Mozhan MarnÃ²( Nahid). Eric William Morris( Todd Leffer). Talia Castro-Pozo( Mona). Frances Li( Vanessa). John Patrick Hayden( David Cooper). Julie Tolivar( Karen Cooper). Oscar Bennett( Miles Epstein). Lucinda Lee Dawson Gray( Sasha Epstein). Juani Feliz( Alejandra Lopez). Zack Robidas( Rich Hertz). Joe Tuttle( Glenn). Cynthia Sosa( Sandra). Pearl Sun( Dr. Janice Wong). Anne L. Nathan( Sharon Fleishman). Sarah Storm( Toby’s Sister). Charles Everett( Golden Doorman). Christian Slater( Archer Sylvan). Michael Gaston( Dr. Donald Bartuck). Peter Grosz( Camp Director). Seth Barrish( Toby’s Father). Vincenzo Amato( Dr. Romalino). Daniel Hepner( Resident #1). Justin Ahdoot( Resident #2). Rebecca Kling( Delivery Room Nurse #1). Tobin Cleary( Zach). Dipti Mehta( Delivery Room Nurse #2). Erin Breen( Allison). Abbey Hafer( Lexi Leffer). Tara Westwood( Amy). Yaron Lotan( Brian). Sierra Rein( Cherry). Nina Kassa( Annie). Nathaniel Levin( Bro #1). Matthew J. Harris( Bro #3). Julianna Zinkel( Suburban Mom). Todd Faulkner( Doorman Albert) . Katie Lee Hill( Sage). J. Smith-Cameron( Barbara Hiller). Jonathan Lipnick( Rabbi Turko). Jake Tapper( Actual Jake Tapper). Maggie Horan( Simone). Tal Ben-Menashe( Israeli Law Student). Tara Summers( Tess). Miriam Silverman( Avigayil). Jimmy Fallon( Jimmy Fallon). Steve Rosen( Mord). Neil Fleischer( Mover Alonger). Jessica Leccia( Dr. Zaffarano). Christine McBurney( Ida). Christopher J. Domig( John). Andrew David Bridges( Steiner). Robin S. Walker( Hallway Nurse). Clem Cheung( Dr. Loo). Ariel Ash( Young Woman #1). Kohler McKenzie( Matt Klein). Maggie Alexander( Some App Woman). Alexandra Bradley( Teen Rachel). Kwabena Ampofo( Marco Lintz). Michael Alexander Henry( Mike). Kimberly Chesser( Young Woman #2). Aki Ando( Mrs. Loo). Michelle Beck( Michelle). Fredi Bernstein( Adi). Tamir( The Beggar Woman). Francine Daveta( Massage Therapist Shari). Erinn Holmes( Young Woman #3). Emilly BÃ¨nami( Neighbor Woman). Nicole Rodenburg( Lisa). Jhordan Munn( Jenny). Denis Ooi( Scream Therapist). Nate Washburn( Waiter). Faith Score( Babysitter). Walter Goldberg( Young Solly). Mariana Novak( Writer). Eva Kantor( Shana). Siraj Huda( Man on Street). Imani Pearl Williams( Sofia). Thea Schoenfeld( Young Hannah). Maryann Towne( Rape Counselor). Azia Celestino( Newscaster). Steve Jean-Baptiste( Hamptons Cop). Pamela Jayne Morgan( Caretaker). Niraj Arjan( Bro #2). Emma Giorgio( Jessica). Nicole Orabona( Support Group Woman #1). Katy Copeland( Woman Who Recognizes Toby). Julian Silver( Editor #1). Unique Jenkins( Support Group Woman #2). Tom Junod( Men’s Magazine Writer). Matt Hopkins( Man in Park). David Beck( Editor #2). Teresa Meza( Support Group Woman #3). Marissa Feinberg( ‘Yoga + Vodka’ Mom). Austin Jennings Boykin( Editor #3). Helena Betancourt( Support Group Woman #4). Meghan Marx( ‘I Woke Up Like This’ Mom). Stephanie Rocio( ‘Eat Sleep Spin Repeat’ Mom). Tracy Weiler( Prenatal Yoga Mom). AnaÃ¯s Blake( Pilates Instructor). Amy Lynne Berger( Canvasser). Tracey Ilgner( Couples Therapist). Adam Dias Berman( Cooper Twin #1). Joshua Gutierrez( Messenger). David Dias Berman( Cooper Twin #2). Simone Norman( Young Drunk Woman). Bonnie Rose( Waitress). Raul Torres( Porter). Gigi Grace( Catherine #1). Colby Kipnes( Catherine #2). Eva Jette Putrello( Catherine #3). Sophie Tananbaum( Catherine #4). Angelina Boris( Catherine #5 )

Language English.

Producers Taffy Brodesser-Akner. Becky Mode. Diana Schmidt. Carl Beverly. Cindy Chupack. Susannah Grant. Sarah Timberman. Anne M. Uemura. Terra Abroms. Shari Springer Berman. Jonathan Dayton. Katie DiMento. Valerie Faris. Robert Pulcini. Alex Bailey. Lisa Lang McMullen.

Production ABC Signature. FX Productions. Timberman-Beverly Productions.

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2022–)
